author: Chris Drummond and Robert C. Holte
title: Exploiting the Cost (In)sensitivity of Decision Tree Splitting Criteria
window: sonar a classifier with a normalized expected cost that is totally independent of misclassification costs and priors. Figure 15 shows cost curves for the different splitting criteria on the sonar data set.
